doctor.name: Dr. Md. Mahbubul Alam (Biplob)
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Mahbubul Alam (Biplob) is a Pediatric Surgeon in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), BCS (Health), MS (Pediatric Surgery), FACS (USA). He is a Assistant Professor, Pediatric Surgery at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Mahbubul Alam (Biplob) at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia is 2.30pm to 4.30pm (Only Tuesday).
